src_original: śarīrādivastuvyatiriktaṃ śubhāśubhakarmakartṛtatphalabhoktṛ nityavyāpirūpamātmākhyaṃ dravyāntaramasti /  tena ca yadi nāma viśvaṃ vyāptaṃ tadapi yadupabhogāyatanatayā pareṇa parigṛhītaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ tadeva sātmakamabhidhīyata iti /
nāpyanumānena pratīyate,  nityaparokṣeṇa deśakālākāravyatirekavikalenātmanā saha kasyacidanvayavyatirekātmakāryakāraṇabhāvāsiddheḥ kāryaliṅgāyogat /
yo hyasya svabhāvaḥ pūrvaparamāṇupratyāsannaḥ na sa evāparaparamāṇupratyāsanno ghaṭate /
evaṃ ca sa pūrvaparamāṇusannihitasvabhāvo 'paraparamāṇuṃ pratyāsīdedyadi so 'pi tatra syāt /  asatyāmapi pratyāsattāvābhimukhyamātre 'pyayameva vṛttāntaḥ /
iti /  na caikāsiddhau anekasyāpi siddhiriti na santi paramāṇavaḥ /
